attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of the petitions that go against Jonathan Ross have been rejected. The people rejecting these petitions should be sacked and replaced. In favour of people that are not in his pocket.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
